Text: Thanks, work like a dream, you are the best. :)

Hey ChattChitto...Love your work...I just got MI-4 Ghost Protocol and it doesn't seem to work...any ideas if another version of AnyDVD available or how to fix it...Thanks in advance:{)

Don't trust this guys torrents! they are ALL trial versions only. They will work for 6 weeks and then you will be asked to buy. time and  time again, I've had to get this guys re-release because even he knows his cracks are full of shit!

@ahearns I dont know if you have the wrong uploader, but I have never had a problem with any of the uploads from ChattChitto. Have you actually stopped the app from trying to update? If you have not then that is where your problem is. 
@ChattChitto Thanks for this. Simple to use as always.
